actions.text: Amendment SA 236 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 236 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S1433-1438; text: CR S1434) To express the sense of the Senate concerning use of certain funds to provide technical assistance for mandatory conservation programs under the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 236 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 236 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate concerning use of certain funds to provide technical assistance for mandatory conservation programs under the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002.
